actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to suspend for one year the enforcement of certain restrictions on irrigation of private lands under the Department of the Interior reclamation projects.

summary.text: Suspends for one year the enforcement of specified restrictions on irrigation of private lands under the Department of the Interior reclamation projects.

titles.title: A bill to suspend for one year the enforcement of certain restrictions on irrigation of private lands under the Department of the Interior reclamation projects.
